document.full_text: world number one rafa nadal began his quest for a sixth barcelona open title in seven years by trouncing fellow spaniard daniel gimeno-traver 6-1 6-1 in the second round on wednesday.
document.title: nadal trounces gimeno-traver in barcelona opener
lines_and_colors: world number one rafa nadal began his quest for a sixth barcelona open title in seven years by trouncing fellow spaniard daniel gimeno-traver 6-1 6-1 in the second round on wednesday.
